ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Equipment Rehash...
ygData.msgSnippet: Would be fairly easy for you to get Orc Fang Earrings to replace the Diamondines.  They drop fairly often off rygorr orcs in Eastern Wastes.  To give you an
ygData.messageBody:
Would be fairly easy for you to get Orc Fang Earrings to replace the
Diamondines. They drop fairly often off rygorr orcs in Eastern Wastes. To
give you an idea how common these items are, I personally looted over 10 of
them over the span of two/three weeks. If you've got the cash and can find
an enchanter who is selling, the new blue diamond jewelry is also an option.
They give insane resist bonuses.

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 07, 2001 11:26 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Equipment Rehash...


Ok, I know we've been over and over this, and I even saved some of the
emails, but....as our IT department is having a crackdown and we are in the
midst of a merger, they enforced our 40mb limit on mailbox sizes and yes, I
admit it, I trashed my store of eqbards mails ... bad me!

Anyway, what I would like to know is what you high level bards are wearing
and weilding .. the weapons/instruments you actually use up into the
mid-high 50s. I'd also like to know if you feel like it, where I can get
these items .. yes I can look them up but feeling lazy today!

As soon as Halana hits 59 (I've given up on 60), I'm going to start focusing
on BRD.

Currently, Tani has (forgive me for spelling mistakes):

-sionoche's partisan
-journeymans stick
-mistmoore drums (working on getting selos)
-lute from mistmoore
-dragonborne sash
-lizzie cloak
-those earrings from mistmoore
-fire opal rings
-fungi tunic
-kylong legs, bracers, hat
-ss boots, gloves
-tattered mantle
-forget the necklace

Let me know which items you all think I can improve on .. especially
weaponwise...if you want send me a private email so Im not spamming everyone
- this is already long!

Thanks, smooches, love you all :)

Halana, 58th Shammykins
Tani, 41st Bardette
Solusek Ro
